Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.repository

Interface StatsGameRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<StatsGame,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StatsGame,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<StatsGame,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<StatsGame,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<StatsGame,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<StatsGame>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<StatsGame,Integer>
@Repository public interface StatsGameRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StatsGame,Integer>
This interface represents the repository for managing StatsGame entities. It extends the JpaRepository interface provided by Spring Data JPA.

  • Method Details

    • findByTeamAndGame

      StatsGame findByTeamAndGame(Team team, Game game)
      Retrieves the StatsGame object for a specific team and game.
      Parameters:
      team - The team for which to retrieve stats.
      game - The game for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      The StatsGame object for the specified team and game or null if not found.

    • findAllIdsWhereIsNotComplete

      @Query(value="SELECT sg.idGame FROM statsgame sg WHERE sg.fgm IS NULL GROUP BY sg.idGame DESC; ", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findAllIdsWhereIsNotComplete()
      Retrieves a list of game IDs where stats are not complete (some fields are null).
      Returns:
      List of game IDs where stats are not complete.

    • findStatsGameByGameAndTeam

      StatsGame findStatsGameByGameAndTeam(Game game, Team team)
      Retrieves the StatsGames object for a specific game and team.
      Parameters:
      game - The game for which to retrieve stats.
      team - The team for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      The StatsGame object for the specified game and team or null if not found.

    • findAllowedPoints

      @Query(value="SELECT AVG(sg.points) FROM statsgame sg WHERE sg.idGame IN (SELECT g.id FROM game g WHERE (g.idVisitor =:inputIdTeam OR g.idHome =:inputIdTeam) AND g.season=:inputSeason ) AND sg.idTeam !=:inputIdTeam", nativeQuery=true) Float findAllowedPoints(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Calculates the average points allowed by a team in games of a specific season where they were not the specified team.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to calculate average allowed points.
      season - The season for which to calculate average allowed points.
      Returns:
      The average points allowed by the specified team in games of the specified season.

    • findPointsPerGame

      @Query(value="SELECT AVG(sg.points) FROM statsgame sg LEFT JOIN game g on sg.idGame=g.id WHERE sg.idTeam =:inputIdTeam AND g.season=:inputSeason ", nativeQuery=true) Float findPointsPerGame(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Calculates the average points scored per game by a team in games of a specific season.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to calculate average points per game.
      season - The season for which to calculate average points per game.
      Returns:
      The average points scored per game by the specified team in games of the specified season.
